name: Using fixtures to represent data
body: Fixtures are a great way to mock data for responses to routes
quiz1: A playing sound that conveys key information
Information and user interface components must be presentable to users in ways they can perceive.
quiz2: A measurement of the difference between two colors when they are layered on top of each other
quiz3: Use an alt attribute to communicate the function of the image
Provide a brief description of the image
quiz4: Loss of fine control of movement
Ensure all functions can be accessed with the keyboard
Users may not be able to use the mouse or peripherals
Users may become fatigued when using the assistive technologies
quiz5: Clearly define any errors and suggestions to fix them
Provide them enough time to read the content
Writing with their non dominant hand
